class.name: UtilityAIAngleVector2Sensor
class.brief_description: Accepts two vectors, calculates the angle between them and scales it to [code]0..1[/code] range.

members.member: Input value for the sensor. Base value for the angle calculation, for example the direction of an AI entity.
The maximum value for the angle between from and to in degrees, this corresponds to [code]1.0[/code] for the sensor_value. Updates the euler angle automatically.
The maximum value for the angle between from and to in radians, this corresponds to [code]1.0[/code] for the sensor_value. Updates the euler angle automatically.
The minimum value for the angle between from and to in degrees, this corresponds to [code]0.0[/code] for the sensor_value. Updates the euler angle automatically.
The minimum value for the angle between from and to in radians, this corresponds to [code]0.0[/code] for the sensor_value. Updates the euler angle automatically.
Input value for the sensor. The other vector to compare from-vector to, for example direction to closest enemy entity.
